|802dot11_protocols = bg |defaulip = 10.0.0.2 |defaultlogin = admin |defaultpass = zoomadsl |defaultssid = zoom |defaultssid_regex = ^zoom$ |default_ch = |manuf = XAVi |manuf_model = |manuf_rev = |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = |availability = |eoldate = |fccapprovdate = 06/22/2007 |estreldate = |estprice = |upc = |ean = |dx_sku = |newegg = |asin = |asin_country = |asin2 = |asin_country2 = |countrymanuf = China |buttons = |led = |dimensions = |weight = |wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1cpu = true |rad1chip2 = Conexant;CX50221; |rad1oui = |rad1_ant_conn = none |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4 }}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== This entry probably applies to models 5590C, 5590D, 5590E, 5590F. All the models appear to accept the same firmware and are lumped together on Zoom's support pages. There appears to be a later revision model with a FCC ID of BDN1058AWL (filed 12/08/2009). This revision is shown with a CX50321 RF chip. Per the manual, the default SSID is '''zoom'''. ==Links of Interest== *[http://www.zoomtel.com/documentation/adsl/5590C-H_UserGuide_EngB.pdf User guide] *[http://wiki.openwrt.org/toh/xavi/xavi_7968 '''XAVi 7968''' on the '''OpenWrt''' Wiki] ==JTAG-Serial Info== ===Serial=== ====Serial Pinouts==== 
JP701
(TxD) (RxD) (GND)

----> To LEDs
<---- To RJ11 port
